FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about Veo 4 generator and how it can transform your video creation process

items.question: What is Veo 4 and how does it work?
items.answer: Veo 4 is Google's latest AI video generation model that creates high-quality videos from text descriptions. Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI will generate a professional video that matches your vision with stunning detail and realism.

items.question: What video quality and formats can I generate?
items.answer: Veo 4 generates videos in up to 4K resolution with various aspect ratios including 16:9, 9:16, and 1:1. You can export in multiple formats including MP4 and MOV, optimized for different platforms like YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and professional use.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
items.answer: Video generation typically takes 2-5 minutes depending on the complexity and length of your request. Our optimized processing ensures you get high-quality results quickly, allowing you to iterate and refine your videos efficiently.

items.question: Can I control specific aspects of the video?
items.answer: Yes! Veo 4 offers advanced controls including camera movements, lighting conditions, scene transitions, and duration. You can specify detailed instructions for cinematography, mood, and visual style to achieve your exact creative vision.

items.question: Is there a limit to video length?
items.answer: Currently, Veo 4 can generate videos from 5 seconds up to 2 minutes in length. This range covers most use cases from social media clips to longer-form content, with the ability to create multiple segments for longer projects.

items.question: Can I use generated videos commercially?
items.answer: Yes, all videos generated with Veo 4 can be used for commercial purposes. You retain full rights to your generated content and can use it for marketing, advertising, social media, or any other business applications.

items.question: Do you offer team collaboration features?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our platform includes team workspaces, real-time collaboration, project sharing, and comment systems. Multiple team members can work together on video projects with role-based access control and version management.
